title: Not recording me watching OPL finals
body:
I've watch the OPL finals all games now multiple times but the mission is stuck at 2/3 and i cannot complete the mission
I originally got the two watches completed as i watched the live stream on the league website via twitch
the vods are on youtube and I'm unsure if this has an effect on how why I watch watching the games
is it possible for me to complete the challenge or do i miss out on the icon {{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
Hi BenjiboyISme, sorry for the confusion but you must watch the vods from [this page](https://watch.oce.lolesports.com/vods/oce-opl/opl_2019_split1) for them to count for the mission.
Try watching Game 2 and 3 from that site for at least 15 mins each and see how you go.
